channel.title: Cant FIGURE out 2 THINGS please HELP!
channel.description: First: Ok first how do you make closed doors open? I click on the door and it doesn't open.??????? :confused: Second: How do I make the home tele, teleport to my home(starting point)?

item.title: Cant FIGURE out 2 THINGS please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:3, topic:259346”]im not sure how you would make them open but if it gets annoying just delete.

use deleteobject method or deletewall method, its one of those.

  1. } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = coords here; teleportToY = coords here; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }[/quote] I don’t see how mod allstar made that.
    Mod allstar did not make the ‘sendMessage’ command.
    I don’t understand that.

In your action packet,
Add the Door ID
Example

case ####:
moveObject(#######); // I don't know about that. I've never used the variable before.
break;

Read full topic
item.source: Cant FIGURE out 2 THINGS please HELP!

item.title: Cant FIGURE out 2 THINGS please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

if you want something fast and easy about the doors, you can fix twoslot doors.
just set one part of the door to tele you inside the house or whatever you want, and the other to tele you out of it.

item.title: Cant FIGURE out 2 THINGS please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

im not sure how you would make them open but if it gets annoying just delete.

use deleteobject method or deletewall method, its one of those.

  1. } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = coords here; teleportToY = coords here; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }

item.title: Cant FIGURE out 2 THINGS please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @wontonz wontonz
item.description:
@wontonz wrote:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = INSTERT X COORDS HERE!; teleportToY = INSTERT Y COORDS HERE!; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }

Hope that helped
